answers.answer: have you been to the doctor to get check for diabetes?i have a 11 yr old daughter that have dark marks on her neck and @ school they told me it could be signs of diabetes i got her checked and her test was negative,but the doc said that doest mean that she couldnt get in the future bcus she is over weight.so just get you some time and go see the doc.    good luck and god bless you!

title: i have dark marks in my neck  i would like to know what this could be.
